title: Blackberry and apple cobbler
ingredients: ['For the fruit', '700g blackberries', '700g cooking apples (or use dessert apples and reduce the amount of sugar to about 4 tbsp)', '6 tbsp sugar', '5 tbsp plain flour', '1 tbsp melted butter', 'For the topping', '150g plain flour', '2 tsp baking powder', '60g butter', '3 tbsp sugar', '120ml buttermilk (or fresh milk with 1/2 a tbsp lemon juice)']
